content: the pegasus hat crochet pattern is perfect for all skill levels featuring a ribbed texture and front/back post stitches with sizes available from preemie to adult l this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a photo tutorial for easy crafting **unique features-** versatile sizing options for all ages intriguing waffle stitch texture adds depth detailed photo tutorial for easy construction soft and vibrant lion brand mandala yarn **materials needed-** hooks 5mm us size 8 0 4mm us size 6 0 yarn mandala dk weight 150-290 yards gauge 15 stitches by 13 row = 4 inches in waffle stitch this is just one of the patterns included in our hat of the month club collection **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda join the cal newsletter here https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
